abstract: Joseph J. Lhota, who is known for his expertise in budgets and finance, has little background in transit.
snippet: Joseph J. Lhota, who is known for his expertise in budgets and finance, has little background in transit.
lead_paragraph: 11:20 p.m. | Updated It is one of the more momentous tasks facing the Cuomo administration: turning around New York City's ailing mass transit system, the largest in the country.

headline.main: Cuomo Picks Political Veteran to Lead M.T.A.
